text: "Roll On Down the Highway" is a 1975 song by Bachman-Turner Overdrive. It was taken from their third studio album Not Fragile. It went to number 4 in Canada, number 14 in the United States, number 18 in Germany, number 20 in New Zealand, number 22 in the United Kingdom and number 80 in Australia. Category:1975 songs Category:Rock songs Category:The Donnas songs
title: Roll On down the Highway
